item.description:
Saturday, July 26, 2008 at 7:00 PM
Where
Captain's Fishing Parties
Plum Island Point
Newburyport , MA 01950
Call: Island John @ 978-235-6148

Details
ANNUAL BLUES CRUISE NEWBURYPORT!
WHEN: Saturday, July 26

TIME: Sails @ 7pm
Returns @ 10pm

COST: $32.00 advance ( +a processing fee)
$36.00 day oof the cruise ( +a processing fee)
FOR TICKETS CALL: Island John @ 978-235-6148


DESCRIPTION:
New England's Hottest Live Blues Cruise on the Merrimack River

FEATURING: Shirley Lewis Expereeance WITH J. Laite and Sweet Willie

Cruise the Merrimack River with live music aboard the boat "Captain's Lady 111"

COOL BLUES CASH BAR SNACKS COOL BOAT LIVE MUSIC
www.newburyportbluescruise.com
* NOTE: Wow, Shirley Lewis is fantastic! on land... I can't even begin to imagine how great this is going to be @ sea! I will be updating this event. More to follow.
***JUST IN! SURPRISE special "pre-cruise" event TBA
item.how_to_find_us: TBA: please check back for an update
item.why: This is a yearly event! Always a sell out!"Shirley Lewis Expereeance" puts on a fantastic show! Checlk out the photos from when she was recently at Gilrein's
item.name: Annual Blues Cruise - Newburyport!
